examples: Input:nums = [-2,0,-1]Output:0Explanation:The result cannot be 2, because [-2,-1] is not a subarray.
constraints: The product of any prefix or suffix ofnumsisguaranteedto fit in a32-bitinteger.
data.problem_statement:
Given an integer arraynums, find asubarraythat has the largest product, and returnthe product.

The test cases are generated so that the answer will fit in a32-bitinteger.
data.title: Maximum Product Subarray
